channel.title: Elvarg! //317//better than arrav//hardcore pvm pvp//
channel.description:
[center]Elvarg[/center] [center]looking for a great new rsps? here's your answer[/center]
[center]PLAY http://elvarg.com/play/[/center] [center]Website http://elvarg.com [/center] [center]http://elvarg.com/forums/forum.php][/center]
[center]Why choose us?[/center]
We offer a great variety of different tasks. Something new to do. We listen to Suggestions and add them if they seem willingly to benefit the server. We have dedicated Developers to keep you happy.
We stride to keep the server as enjoyable for players. We don't want no one bored and leaving us!. We are always thinking of new ways to attract you!
What we have?
A clean 317 Server with features like
Castlewars!
ZERO Lag
Pest control with NPCS!
Amazing Bosses to choose from
Amazing Economy
Hunter skill;
Slayer System with rewards
PK system with Rewards
Clipped following + Npc Clipping
Dedicated Developers
Friendly Owner+Staff
Donator Benefits
Amazing skills (all work)
Quests!
Cook Assistant
Dragon Slayer
Desert Treasure
All 3 Magic spells work!
Great Prayer system
A stable economy.
Friendly players
Daily updates
Beta
Forums, with 1 year webhost
VPS 24/7 Online.
Smooth pking/PVM
Alot of bosses and monsters to kill.
Bosses aren't too easy nor too hard.
Great Combat + PVM
i will post pics soon)
